Abu Dhabi University: Abu Dhabi University (ADU) (Arabic: جامعة أبوظبي) is a private research university with its main campus in Khalifa City, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates, and satellite campuses in Al Ain, Dubai and Madinat Zayed.[4] Founded in 2003 by Ali Saeed bin Harmal al-Dhaheri,[5] it is the largest private institution in the country that offers courses in various subjects up to post-graduation.[6][7]
